ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result)
$ = (a) => doc.select(a)
if (/function S2H/.test(result)) {
	function S2H(s){
        var r = [];
        for(var i=0;i<s.length/2;i++){
            r[r.length]= parseInt(s.substr(i*2,2), 16);
        }
        return r;
    }
    var str = S2H(String($('str').html()).replace(/\s/ig,''));
    var key = S2H(String(cookie.getKey(source.getKey(),'key')));
    var x = 0, ret = "";
    for(var i=0;i<str.length;i++){
        var d = (str[i] + key[x]);
        if(d>255)d=d%255;
        ret+='%'+('0'+d.toString(16)).substr(-2,2);
        x++; if(x>=key.length) x=0;
    }
    var html = decodeURIComponent(decodeURI(ret));
    $('str').html(html);
}
doc</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
page = java.getElement("@@class.last_page");
data = page.attr("href");

ys = data.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1];

list = [({ text: "第1页", href: baseUrl })];

if (ys !== null) {
  for (i = 2; i <= ys; i++) {
    list.push({ text: "第" + i + "页", href: baseUrl.replace(/page=1/, "page=" + i) });
  }
}
list;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//本地解密标志位
DEBUG = 0

{{source.bookSourceComment}}

// origin 
origin = source.getVariable()

// aes keys auto update
chjs = src.match(/['"](.*?ch.js\?v=(\d+))/)
if (DEBUG || (chjs && chjs[2] != 202208132)) {
  cache.put("manwa_aes_key", parseKey(chjs[1]))
}

// img_array
imgs = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src)
.select(".content-img").toArray()
.map(v=>v.attr("data-r-src"))

if (DEBUG) imgs.splice(1)

imgs.toImg(null,
{headers:{origin:origin}}
	)

</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

<js>
result=java.ajax("http://"+result.match(/\("\/\/(.*?)"/)[1])
</js>
@js:
if(result.match(/replace/)){
s=result.match(/replace.*?\{(.*?)\}/)[1].replace(/\\/g,'\\\\')
num=s.split(',').length
for(var i=0;i<num;i++){
	m=s.match(/"(.*?)":"(.*?)"/)
	s=s.replace(/.*?,/,'')
	result=result.replace(new RegExp(m[2],'g'),m[1])
	}
	}else{
result
if(result.match(/txt_call/)){
	result="因网站问题没有正文"
	}
